title: 第二十三次民間記者會：「魔警濫權，人神共憤；公僕同僚，恥與為伍」

replies.msg:
第二十三次民間記者會

數月以來，魔警假借「維護法紀」之名欺壓巿民，勾結鄉黑，視法制為無物。香港警隊樂於淪為政治工具，挾勢弄權，身為公僕卻與民為敵，更以暴力打壓香港言論及集會自由，干預區議會選舉。有化驗團隊亦發現，國產催淚彈的山埃含量超標，魔警恣意毒害市民。一眾有良知的公僕不齒魔警與極權政府的惡行，恥與為伍！數個公務員部門朋友率先現身民間記者會，齊聲反抗！

主題：魔警濫權，人神共憤；公僕同僚，恥與為伍
日期：2019年11月4日（星期一）
時間：晚上8:00

大家可於以下或其他頻道收看直播：
基進報導：https://www.facebook.com/radicalhk/
反送中直播：http://www.hklivegroup.com/ （首次觀睇需要下載加密插件）
立場新聞：https://www.facebook.com/standnewshk/
香港蘋果日報：https://www.facebook.com/hk.nextmedia/
香港電台：https://www.facebook.com/RTHKVNEWS/
Now新聞：https://www.facebook.com/now.comNews/

The 23rd Citizens’ Press Conference

In the past few months, the Hong Kong Police Force has been in a craze of browbeating and harassing Hong Kong citizens. This is done in the name of "law and order", while simultaneously colluding with gangsters and triads to terrorize the public, in complete disregard of the rule of law. The HKPF has succumbed to political pressure, and reduced itself to a mere intimidation tool of the government. The police chose to aim their guns at the general public, greeting peaceful demonstrations with brutal violence, and thereby suppressing freedom of speech and assembly. In doing so the District Council Election has been severely disturbed as legal gatherings of candidates were smothered by police brutality. Civil servants are ashamed of the crimes committed by the HKPF and the dictatorship of the Hong Kong Government. Some of them now take the lead to voice their dissent in the upcoming conference.

Topic: In Honour and Dignity: Civil Servants Denounce Police Brutality
Date: 4 Nov 2019
Time: 20:00

民間記者會頻道 Citizens' PC Channel
https://t.me/citizenspresscon
曱近平

replies.msg: 大家今晚一齊睇啦
再一次多謝咁多位民間記者會成員既朋友，你地既付出，香港人真係無言感激

推
會唔會有地點播埋俾啲銀髮族睇？
我覺得之前3點搞 效果好似好D 不過都支持

其實我有個諗法
就係佢地可唔可以喺口罩開個細細地既窿
因為有時收音收得唔好
又隔住個口罩
好難聽佢地講野

咁喺個口果度開個窿
唔知可唔可行
咁當然，佢地既安全係最重要
如果開個窿會令佢地曝光
咁當然唔好咁做
